text: Bavanat (, also Romanized as Bavanat; formerly, Bavanat (, also Romanized as Bavānāt and Bavānāt) is a city and capital of Bavanat County, Fars Province, Iran. ==name change== In 2001, the name of Surian city was changed to Bavanat and now the center of Bavanat city is called Bavanat city.https://rc.majlis.ir/fa/law/show/121678/تغییر-نام-سوریان-به-بوانات https://qavanin.ir/law/Attribute/101303/نام-شهر-سوریان-به-بوانات-تغییر-یافت == References == Category:Cities in Fars Province
title: Bavanat
